name: Pinguino's Egg
description:
Help Pinguino catch his egg before it is lost forever!

Controls

Jump - Up Arrow, W, or Spacebar

Move - Arrow Keys or WASD

Slide - Hold down and right or left

Pause - P

Mute Sound - M

Restart - Backspace

Credits

Game by Adventure Byte

Music by James Calcineros - http://mcjimmy.net

Feel free to leave comments and feedback about how to improve the game!
